data.message:
This/That

V1: I don't want to deal with your crap, I want to save the animals and make a few rap, songs that keep me calm, either on a paper on my palm, cause it helps me block the people who call me a freak, cause I don't eat meat, and who tell me Steve Irwin is a bad role model, yeah I will risk my life to save any animal and that makes me awful, that's what he taught me while your hero will eventually make you work at a brothel

Hook: fuck this, th-th, this
Fuck that, th-th, that
Fuck this, th-th, this
Fuck that, th-th, that

V2: I was stressed until last I put my pen on my pad, because of school that doesn't help only makes you angry stressed and sad, they teach you bull crap that you don't even need, teach us about life skills and not lights speed, we don't need that shit anyways, teach us about taxes, how to see pass the bullshit of a car dealer ship to get a good deal, why do y'all fell, like teaching about how to buy a house intelligently, what a mortgage is, investing and stocks, we don't care about the creation of rocks, disagree GO SUCK SOME COCKS

V3: go away can you go away, school turns a yellow soul to Grey, go away can you go away, school turns a yellow soul to Grey
